\w It|strong="H1961"\w* \w proceeded|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w Azmon|strong="H6111"\w*, joined \w the|strong="H5674"\w* \w Brook|strong="H5158"\w* \w of|strong="H1366"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w and|strong="H4714"\w* \w ended|strong="H1961"\w* \w at|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H5674"\w* \w Sea|strong="H3220"\w*. \w This|strong="H2088"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w their|strong="H1961"\w* \w southern|strong="H5045"\w* \w border|strong="H1366"\w*.

\w The|strong="H5704"\w* \w eastern|strong="H6924"\w* \w border|strong="H1366"\w* \w was|strong="H1366"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w Salt|strong="H4417"\w* \w Sea|strong="H3220"\w* \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w far|strong="H5704"\w* \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w mouth|strong="H7097"\w* \w of|strong="H1366"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*. \w The|strong="H5704"\w* \w northern|strong="H6828"\w* \w border|strong="H1366"\w* \w started|strong="H6285"\w* \w from|strong="H6285"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w bay|strong="H3956"\w* \w of|strong="H1366"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* \w at|strong="H3383"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w mouth|strong="H7097"\w* \w of|strong="H1366"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*,

\w From|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* hilltop \w the|strong="H3318"\w* \w border|strong="H1366"\w* \w curved|strong="H8388"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* \w spring|strong="H4599"\w* \w of|strong="H5892"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* \w Waters|strong="H4325"\w* \w of|strong="H5892"\w* \w Nephtoah|strong="H5318"\w*, \w proceeded|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w of|strong="H5892"\w* \w Mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Ephron|strong="H6085"\w*, \w and|strong="H5892"\w* \w then|strong="H3318"\w* bent around \w toward|strong="H3318"\w* \w Baalah|strong="H1173"\w* (\w that|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w*, \w Kiriath-jearim|strong="H7157"\w*).

\w Then|strong="H1961"\w* \w it|strong="H1961"\w* \w went|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H5674"\w* \w northern|strong="H6828"\w* \w slope|strong="H3802"\w* \w of|strong="H2022"\w* \w Ekron|strong="H6138"\w*, \w curved|strong="H8388"\w* \w toward|strong="H5674"\w* \w Shikkeron|strong="H7942"\w*, \w proceeded|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w Mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Baalah|strong="H1173"\w*, \w went|strong="H3318"\w* \w on|strong="H5674"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w Jabneel|strong="H2995"\w*, \w and|strong="H2022"\w* \w ended|strong="H1961"\w* \w at|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H5674"\w* \w Sea|strong="H3220"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5439"\w* \w western|strong="H3220"\w* \w border|strong="H1366"\w* \w was|strong="H3063"\w* \w the|strong="H5439"\w* \w coastline|strong="H1366"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5439"\w* \w Great|strong="H1419"\w* \w Sea|strong="H3220"\w*. \w These|strong="H2088"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5439"\w* boundaries \w around|strong="H5439"\w* \w the|strong="H5439"\w* \w clans|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5439"\w* \w descendants|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*.

\w According|strong="H6310"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*’s \w command|strong="H6310"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w*, \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w Caleb|strong="H3612"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jephunneh|strong="H3312"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w portion|strong="H2506"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*—\w Kiriath-arba|strong="H7153"\w*, \w that|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w*, \w Hebron|strong="H2275"\w*. (Arba \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* forefather \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Anak|strong="H6061"\w*.)

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w Caleb|strong="H3612"\w* \w drove|strong="H3423"\w* \w out|strong="H3423"\w* \w from|strong="H1121"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w the|strong="H3423"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Anak|strong="H6061"\w*—\w the|strong="H3423"\w* \w descendants|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Sheshai|strong="H8344"\w*, Ahiman, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Talmai|strong="H8526"\w*, \w the|strong="H3423"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Anak|strong="H6061"\w*.

\w From|strong="H6440"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w he|strong="H8033"\w* \w marched|strong="H5927"\w* \w against|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w Debir|strong="H1688"\w* (\w formerly|strong="H6440"\w* known \w as|strong="H5927"\w* \w Kiriath-sepher|strong="H7158"\w*).

\w And|strong="H1323"\w* \w Caleb|strong="H3612"\w* said, “\w To|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* man \w who|strong="H1323"\w* \w strikes|strong="H5221"\w* \w down|strong="H5221"\w* \w Kiriath-sepher|strong="H7158"\w* \w and|strong="H1323"\w* \w captures|strong="H3920"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w*, \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H5414"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w Acsah|strong="H5915"\w* \w in|strong="H5414"\w* marriage.”

\w So|strong="H5414"\w* \w Othniel|strong="H6274"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Caleb|strong="H3612"\w*’s brother \w Kenaz|strong="H7073"\w* \w captured|strong="H3920"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* city, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Caleb|strong="H3612"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w Acsah|strong="H5915"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w in|strong="H1121"\w* marriage.

\w One|strong="H1961"\w* day Acsah \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* Othniel \w and|strong="H7704"\w* urged \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w ask|strong="H7592"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* father \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w*. \w When|strong="H1961"\w* \w she|strong="H5921"\w* got \w off|strong="H5921"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w donkey|strong="H2543"\w*, \w Caleb|strong="H3612"\w* \w asked|strong="H7592"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w*, “\w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w do|strong="H4100"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w desire|strong="H7592"\w*?”

“\w Give|strong="H5414"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w blessing|strong="H1293"\w*,” \w she|strong="H3588"\w* answered. “\w Since|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H5414"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w* land \w in|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Negev|strong="H5045"\w*, \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w* \w springs|strong="H1543"\w* \w of|strong="H4325"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w as|strong="H3588"\w* well.” \w So|strong="H5414"\w* Caleb \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w her|strong="H5414"\w* both \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w upper|strong="H5942"\w* \w and|strong="H4325"\w* \w lower|strong="H8482"\w* \w springs|strong="H1543"\w*.

\w This|strong="H2063"\w* \w is|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w clans|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*.
